plot: "Trident Ploughshares" aim to disarm Britain's Trident submarines and their nuclear missiles. In Scotland, they cut their way into the bases, swim up to the submarines, and sink laboratory equipment.
title: The Loch Long Monster
plot_es: "Trident Ploughshares" aim to disarm Britain's Trident submarines and their nuclear missiles. In Scotland, they cut their way into the bases, swim up to the submarines, and sink laboratory equipment.

produce.name: Hochschule für Fernsehen und Film München (HFF)
